title: Chimichurri Dipping Sauce and Marinade
directions: Into a food processor, combine the oil, vinegar, lime juice, jalapenos, garlic, parsley, oregano, and red pepper flakes.
Blend for 30 seconds and season to taste with salt and pepper. Process for another 10 seconds
Pour half the sauce over the food to be marinated and reserve the other half.
Marinate your meat and/or veggies for 30 minutes 4 to 8 hours.
Remove the food from the marinade and grill until done. Discard used marinade.
ingredients: Â½ cup fresh lime juice (4 to 5 limes)
